data.title: The Godfather: Part II Original 1974 U.S. Banner
data.meta_description: Original 1974 U.S. banner for the film The Godfather: Part II directed by Francis Ford Coppola with Al Pacino / Robert Duvall / Diane Keaton / Robert De Niro.
